message.content:
cs.DC, cs.CR, cs.DB, cs.Distributed, cs.SY 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) - The paper discusses the design of distributed blockchain systems and the use of parallel pipelines to improve throughput, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
2. cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) - The paper discusses Byzantine-Fault Tolerant (BFT) protocols and their use in blockchain systems, which is a topic related to cryptography and security. 
3. cs.DB (Databases) - The paper discusses the design of database systems for blockchain applications, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
4. cs.Distributed (Distributed Computing) - The paper discusses the design of distributed blockchain systems, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
5. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper discusses the design and implementation of a permissioned blockchain system, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
